nav.div: Los Lunas Schools » News » Update on LLS Closure

a.title: Free Meals for Students During Closure

div.a: Free Meals for Students During Closure

div.div: Latest on LLS Closure Due to CoronaVirus Precautions

div.img:
Due to the CoronaVirus, the governor has called for a shutdown of all New Mexico Schools from March 16, 2020 through the end of the school year.
We have learned that the following allowances are being made for New Mexico Schools:
PED will waive the instructional hours requirement, so that school days will not need to be made up.
We will ask teachers who are willing and able to provide online or distance learning programs to offer those on a voluntary basis during the closure. We will give teachers more ideas on how to accomplish this for our kids as soon as possible.
